front.title: Route Configuration by DHCPv6 Option for Hosts with Multiple Interfaces

abstract.t: Currently, more and more hosts have multiple interfaces such as GPRS, WiFi etc. One key issue is how to make the applications on the host access the network accordingly through the proper interfaces. The approach presented in this document is to define new DHCPv6 option to configure route tables of the hosts. In this way, the hosts can select a appropriate route.
